wikipedia_page.main: William Reid Blyton, Baron Blyton (2 May 1899 – 25 October 1987) was a British Labour Party politician who served as Member of Parliament (MP) for Houghton-le-Spring in the County of Durham from 1945 to 1964.

response: * Billy Blyton, Baron Blyton (1899–1987), English MP
